body_html: @apaszke Just to be clear: we still want to move to the API design from my PR (#6345) which is as close as possible to Python. Our new strategy is simply that instead of developing the C++ API separately from autogradpp (and then merging them after), I will make changes directly to autogradpp.

body: @apaszke Just to be clear: we still want to move to the API design from my PR (#6345) which is as close as possible to Python. Our new strategy is simply that instead of developing the C++ API separately from autogradpp (and then merging them after), I will make changes directly to autogradpp.
